app1.shortDescription: KakaoTalk is a fast & multifaceted messaging app. Send messages, photos, videos, voice notes and your location for free. Make chatting extra fun with an array of emoticons and sticker collections.

app2.appName: Google Go: A lighter, faster way to search
app2.shortDescription: Google Go is a lighter, faster way to search, with search results optimised to save up to 40% data.
